dct_title_s: Map of the island of Ceylon : (corrected to the beginning of 1868), exhibiting the principal roads, rivers & mountains with the Colombo and Kandy Railway and the proposed extensions
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:515,000 Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Ancillary map: Ceylon Railway. Includes text, and dedication with ill. to Thomas B. Skinner. Affixed to verso are cover pieces advertising Stanford's series of new library maps. Dimensions: 95 x 65 centimeters
dcat_keyword_sm: Sri Lanka Administrative and Political Divisions Maps
